title: Regular Expression Denial of Service
author: Karl Düüna
overview: The validator module, versions < 3.22.1 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service ([ReDoS](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ReDoS)) in the isURL method.
references:
- [Analysis of Node.js platform web application security (pdf)](http://lab.cs.ttu.ee/dl93)
- https://github.com/chriso/validator.js/issues/152#issuecomment-48107184
- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ReDoS
